pr_title: Fix redundant workflow context updates for finished workflows

timeline.message:
Fix redundant workflow context updates for finised workflows

If the workflow has been finished before, there is no need to update the worklfow context.
In this commit, this behavior has been fixed and optimized.

timeline.bodyText: This update is not necessary. When there is a job that needs to be scheduled, we update the workflow context there. If there is no job, then we do not need to update the workflow context
timeline.author: alirezazamani

timeline.bodyText: More tests will be added to this file as we move toward reducing context writes
timeline.author: alirezazamani
